Haha cheers Zack. yeah I got to admit Im only just starting to get vocal on=
 here but I definately want to keep up to date with Franks work. I had a be=
e under my bonnet from a comment chris moon made and also when I question h=
is experiment and he couldnt answer he acted like a complete ass. Well i de=
finately want to learn more about the methods! im in the UK and to be hones=
t not much goes on here in the field of paranormal apart from pointless tv =
shows where people bump into each other and freak out.

once again sorry fo=
r the mix up guys :-)


Kind Regards

Eamonn




__________________________=

On Fri, Jun 5, 2009 at 10:52 AM, eamonn mgherbi <eamo=
nnmgherbi@ yahoo.co. uk> wrote:




Wow first of all dont swear on here and=
 wind your neck in!

Now I have to admit I didnt mean you I was talking abo=
ut Chris moon but hell im at work and im trying to do 2 things at once.

I =
have been following this group for a year and from the message i wrote this=
 is the first time I got a reply. Now Frank I think you work is quality and=
 I definately want to learn more about your work and what you do. and if yo=
u could advise me of where I can see a profile of yourself that would be gr=
eat. but dont start with the abusive crap towards me.

Lets keep it clean. =
Again I was talking about Moon. not you Frank, iv read my message over and =
i definately worded it wrong. Im just not a big fan of Chris Moon.

And the=
 religious crap thing also wind your neck in about that, that was a pretty =
crappy thing first of all im not religious it just causes war. second of al=
l I want to know more about your work.



________________________________

From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@ gmail.com>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .=
com
Sent: Friday, 5 June, 2009 16:25:28
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: [RTSC] a=
 copy of my final e-mail to Frank sumption I will go no further!


=A0Arrog=
ant!? Lets see,=A0I don't do shows, I'm not on podcast every friggin' day p=
roclaiming my expertness, I don't charge money-for anything, I share all in=
formation and schematics, and I do not kiss anyone's ass, guess that must b=
e so egotistical of me.=A0 Arrogant!?, who is=A0the f--- is the duffus out =
there with the high priest mentality?=A0 The really sad part is trhe brain =
dead dorks that follow these clowns. Haliday proclaimed himself box expert =
extraordinaire, and there's those sorry twits that eat up everyword. There =
are no box/paranormal experts, no one knows how this shit works. Go to chur=
ch if you want a religious experience!

=A0Anyway, there is one advantage t=
o using tape, the entities seem capable of changing the messages as needed.=
 I can use the same recording over an over, and I swear, I get meaningful, =
having to do with the moment on every listening. Brain matrixing--perhaps- =
-or does it really change? I can't tell. 

=A0Frank-S



=A0
On Fri, Jun 5,=
 2009 at 3:58 AM, eamonn mgherbi <eamonnmgherbi@ yahoo.co. uk> wrote:




H=
i All

I have to admit that I share the same opinion as Bruce. I dont what =
everyones take is on this but I felt that some of moon and even Franks atti=
tude was slightly arrogant. I am a researcher in the UK using old reel to r=
eel methods and obtaining excellent results. I lost some family and some cl=
ose friends=A05 yeara ago=A0and suddenly it dawned on me...what is life all=
 about. I went on to research every evp pioneer i could, listen to hours/da=
ys of recordings and it changed my outlook on life. tears were turned to sm=
iles and then I realised what all this research is for. it was a big step f=
or me spiritually. 

I dont know if there is anyone else on here using old =
fashioned methods but if anybody would like to hear recordings please ask. =
I am using a reel to reel sony "Hi frequency" recorder and trying various t=
ypes of tones, backgrounds e.t.c.

Good luck to everyone with their researc=
h, you are right we are changing history we are discovering new things. if =
it wasnt for individuals such as raudive, jurghenson to name a few, maybe w=
e wouldnt have discovered this. it takes a brave individual to tackle an ar=
rogant human race blunted with science.

Kind Regards

The quiet one :-)


=

Limited Time Of=
fers: Save big on popular laptops at Dell
Sorry to hear this Bruce, I=A0sur=
e hope things get better, =A0I had no idea there were so many problems when=
 I joined all these lists, =A0I think you are all great people, you folks t=
ogether are making history don't you all realize this?=A0 There are so many=
 people out there that have never heard of this type of communication, thou=
sands out there!=A0 My friend just lost her mother a couple of weeks ago, w=
hen I told her about the work you all are doing, tears were replaced with a=
 smile, she is looking forward to hearing from her mom now too.=A0 Stop try=
ing to hurt each other, it's not worth it, life is too short for this stuff=
.=A0 You are all great people, May God Bless You All=A0~ And He Already Has=
,
sf

In a message dated 6/4/2009 2:27:06 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time, balll=
an94@yahoo. com writes:



guys,

Sorry to burden you with this nonsense bu=
t this group and the RTSC group are my only venues to respond to posts on o=
ther groups and have my account heard, I hope you do not mind to much.

Her=
e is a copy of my final personal e-mail to Frank Sumption which by the way =
is meant for him but he see's fit to post them publicly in an attempt to di=
scredit me.

I want you to read it first hand so there are no chance of it =
being altered before it is posted else where.

I will not address Frank aga=
in
------------ --------- --------- --------- --------- --------- -

Frank,=


This is getting ridiculous now, you should stop writing these posts, all =
you are doing is making yourself look ridiculous.

I have offered many time=
s to make my raw recordings available for review by anyone who wants them. =
I have made the same challenge to your friend moon who we all know is behin=
d this tirade he has time and again refused or ignored the request for any =
type of audio file
to be publicly posted for revue and continues to take ad=
vantage of innocent unsuspecting people with his con game and charging larg=
e amounts of money for sessions where he fabricates and makes up content as=
 he goes along.

I was the only one to confront him in public and expose hi=
m for the fake he is and this is his feeble attempt at retaliation. I and o=
ther researchers like me have brought this research light years from where =
it was when you and I first met, moon just continues to use it to rip peopl=
e off and has not contributed a thing to the research of ghost box communic=
ation beside lining his own pockets. 

Just the fact that he has you doing =
his dirty work shows the type of guy he is. I can remember a time when you =
publicly came out against any type of money making using your boxes and eve=
n refused moon when he wanted to manufacture and sell them for large profit=
s yet now you condone his robbery of innocent unaware people and actually a=
ct foolish on his behest.

Frank you are better than this, just concentrate=
 on developing a better box and forget about moon and his tricks and lies, =
he is finished in the paranormal and he knows it, everyone is wise to his g=
ame and he is practically an outcast.

Frank you are hitching you wagon to =
a dead horse. Get away from these bad influences before they ruin your repu=
tation as well.

We have had this moon discussion in the past and once he h=
as exhausted his need for you he will screw you again like he has done so m=
any times before.

Frank, I like and respect you and I hope you will consid=
er what I have said in this e-mail and I sincerely hope you post this one o=
n the evp-itc group. I will be posting it on my group and others I belong t=
o.

Your former friend
Bruce
